questions.questionText: For what value of \(x\) is the below equation true? $${x\over 5} - 4 = 3(4 - 2x) - 1$$
questions.hint: There is something to be gained here.

questions.questionText: When 368 is divided by 7, the remainder is $x$. What is the remainder when 368 is divided by \(3x\)?
The average (arithmetic mean) of 16 numbers is 3. The average of these 16 numbers and a seventeenth number is 4. What is the seventeenth number?
